properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

This spacious four bedroom detached home offers generous living accommodation ideal for family life. The ground floor features a bright and welcoming living room, a modern fitted kitchen with ample storage and workspace, and a dining area perfect for everyday meals or entertaining guests. The layout is practical and designed to make the most of natural light throughout the property.Upstairs, there are four well-proportioned bedrooms and a contemporary family bathroom. Externally, the property benefits from a large private rear garden, a garage, and additional off-street parking. Located close to transport links, schools, and local amenities, this freehold home offers both comfort and convenience in a popular residential area.

This well-presented one bedroom flat is ideal for first-time buyers or investors seeking a property in a vibrant and well-connected location. The apartment features a bright open-plan living and dining area with a modern fitted kitchen, creating a comfortable space for relaxing or entertaining.The bedroom is generously sized and complemented by a modern bathroom finished to a good standard. Situated on Lewisham High Street, the flat is within walking distance of shops, caf√©s, and excellent transport links, offering easy access to Central London and making it a highly convenient and low-maintenance living option.

This impressive five bedroom detached family home offers extensive living space in a quiet and sought-after residential location. The ground floor provides multiple reception rooms and a modern fitted kitchen, ideal for both family living and entertaining, with direct access to the rear garden.Upstairs, the property boasts five spacious bedrooms and well-appointed bathrooms, offering flexible accommodation for large families or home working. Outside, the large private garden and private driveway add to the appeal, while nearby schools and local amenities make this freehold home a perfect long-term family residence.

This modern three bedroom apartment offers stylish open-plan living in the heart of Canary Wharf. The spacious living and dining area is filled with natural light and leads onto a private balcony, while the contemporary kitchen is fully fitted with integrated appliances and sleek finishes.The apartment includes three well-sized bedrooms and modern bathrooms, making it suitable for families or professionals. Additional benefits include underground parking and excellent transport links within walking distance, with shops, restaurants, and leisure facilities all close by, providing a convenient urban lifestyle.

This charming two bedroom terraced house offers comfortable and practical living space, ideal for young professionals or small families. The ground floor features a bright living area and a well-equipped kitchen with access to a low-maintenance rear garden.Upstairs, there are two well-proportioned bedrooms and a modern family bathroom. Located in a popular Greenwich area, the property is close to local amenities, green spaces, and transport links, making it an attractive freehold home in a highly desirable location.
